directly serializer = new System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer(typeof(Neuron.Samples.Soap.Headers.SecurityHeader)); using (System.IO.MemoryStream outStream = new System.IO.MemoryStream()) { xmlDoc.Save(outStream); outStream.Position = 0; securityHeader = (Neuron.Samples.Soap.Headers.SecurityHeader)serializer.ReadObject(outStream); } // write the property we
